Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: If Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer (if not already increasing). If FALSE and only if timer is elapsed, resets the internal timer. Any change on IN during counting has no effect.

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: If Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer (if not already increasing). If FALSE and only if timer is elapsed, resets the internal timer. Any change on IN during counting has no effect.

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK changes from TRUE to FALSE. FALSE if all other cases

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: OnT
Variable.Comment: Amount of time to keep the output true (seconds)

Variable.Name: OffT
Variable.Comment: Amount of time to keep the output false (seconds)

Variable.Name: Adjust
Variable.Comment: Number of seconds per hour (set 0 to indicate 3600)

Variable.Name: HoursRetain
Variable.Comment: Count of hours (updated only every HoursNo hours)

Variable.Name: Alrm
Variable.Comment: Signals that the maximum number of operating hours have been reached

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Du
Variable.Comment: Down/Up, indicate the direction of count

Variable.Name: Enable
Variable.Comment: Enables the update of the output

Variable.Name: Adjust
Variable.Comment: Number of seconds per hour (set 0 to indicate 3600)

Variable.Name: HoursRetain
Variable.Comment: Count of hours (updated only every HoursNo hours)

Variable.Name: Alrm
Variable.Comment: Signals that the maximum number of operating hours have been reached

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Du
Variable.Comment: Down/Up, indicate the direction of count

Variable.Name: Enable
Variable.Comment: Enables the update of the output

Variable.Name: ImpulseOff_Time
Variable.Comment: Время импульса выключения SV1 в импульсном режиме

Variable.Name: ImpulseOn_Time
Variable.Comment: Время импульса включения SV1 в импульсном режиме

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Du
Variable.Comment: Down/Up, indicate the direction of count

Variable.Name: Enable
Variable.Comment: Enables the update of the output

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Falling edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Rising edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE: total time is elapsed

Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed
